basics.name: Adam Embury
basics.summary:
A competent and dedicated full stack developer with over 10 years experience developing software solutions using a wide range of Microsoft and web technologies. 

Extensively involved in all phases of the project lifecycle, from customer requirements gathering through to product support, in a variety of roles. 

Excellent communication skills acquired from frequent customer interaction along with experience of managing and working within teams, as well as alone, to deliver solutions on deadline. 

I have a proven track record of being an excellent problem solver, demonstrating an ability to communicate with clients at all levels, whilst working under pressure to meet strict deadlines. 

I regularly attend local Tech and Agile user groups and have keen interest in constantly improving myself and those around me.

work.summary:
Senior .Net developer responsible for building responsive MVC websites as well as supporting APIs and windows applications.
Rewrite of Webforms site written in VB.Net into a C# MVC5 application.

Focussed on delivering complex B2B and B2C eCommerce and content based websites based on the EPiServer framework, ASP.NET MVC4, and AngularJS, as the Tech Lead of a multi-disciplined team.

Responsible for building an automated test and deployment pipeline using a combination of TeamCity, Octopus Deploy, FAKE and PowerShell.

Built a faceted navigation system using a combination of AngularJS, Web API and Elastic Search.

Responsible for the technical oversight of a multi-channel eCommerce project. 

Introduced the use of Jenkins as a Continuous Integration Server and a transition to Git for source control.

Guided the team in the introduction of better development techniques such as refactoring the code to allow the introduction of unit tests using NUnit.

Responsible for directing the team in following a more Agile way of working and have recently introduced the use of BDD and Kanban.

Built an information dashboard using a combination of Ruby, Coffeescript and a Web API backend

Development of a javascript single page application based on the Sencha ExtJS framework, and REST back-end services built using MVC3.

Responsible for technical delivery of projects, estimation, quality, consistency and maintainability of the development activity.

highlights: Development of an eCommerce website using MVC2 and the companies in-house ORM/business framework

work.summary:
Leading teams of developers and being responsible for the technical design and implementation of the software systems.
Performing staff appraisals within the software group.

Software development with a special emphasis on C#.NET, whilst also utilising other technologies such as VBA, Oracle and scripting languages. Software development encompassing both standalone products and the development of add-in modules for existing applications.
·  Involved in a large number of projects over the full range of stages and aspects of the software lifecycle - requirements gathering, specification creation, system design, testing, product development, system deployment and system maintenance. 
.  Projects were a mix of individually assigned and team-based.
·  Responsible for designing the software solution for a system that was awarded the Queen’s Award for Enterprise.
·  Customer facing role – as the solutions are in most cases customer specific, the customer is involved to a large extent in the product development life-cycle. I have been involved in numerous commercial and technical meetings involving many of the world’s largest Pharmaceutical companies.
·  Involved in the quotation and sales process with new and existing customers.
·  Used to working in a highly regulated environment, and with highly confidential information.
·  Commissioning, testing and maintenance of systems throughout the UK, Europe and USA.
·  Developed a wide range of different products, including windows services, desktop applications, and application libraries.

education.area: Computer Science, Electronics, Digital Circuit Design

references.name: Richard Stockley
references.reference: Adam is an exceptional, well rounded software engineer. With the ability to seamlessly deliver elegant solutions to complex problems and lead multi-disciplinary teams from the front, he would be the first choice in any team I had to assemble.
